item.title: French Oscar Shortlist Includes Richard Linklater’s ‘Nouvelle Vague,’ Jafar Panahi’s ‘It Was Just an Accident’ and Rebecca Zlotowski’s ‘A Private Life’
item.description: France has unveiled a shortlist of five films for its submission to the international feature race: Richard Linklater’s “Nouvelle Vague,” a love letter to the French cinematic moveme
